name: Subscription Eligibility (Unlock Protocol V14)
details: This module adds a subscription requirement to a hat. Wearers must make a recurring payment to keep the hat.

This module is powered by Unlock Protocol. Deploying this module will also create a new lock contract (Public Lock version 14), and will automatically mint a hat to the recipient of a newly purchased key. The wearer will remain eligible as long as their subscription is active.
To work properly, this module must be set as the eligibility module for the target hat and wear one of the target hat's admin hats.

mutable.name: Subscription Period
mutable.description: How often a payment must be made to keep the hat

mutable.name: Payment Token
mutable.description: The token used to make payments

mutable.name: Subscription Price
mutable.description: The price of a payment for a single subscription period

mutable.name: Max Subscribers
mutable.description: The maximum number of addresses that can pay for this hat. Suggested greater than or equal to the max wearers for this hat.

mutable.name: Lock Manager
mutable.description: The manager of the lock contract, who can modify many of the lock's settings.

mutable.name: Lock Name
mutable.description: The name of the lock NFT. Suggested to include the name of this hat.
